san-lo-bi-vb-pc106:8: bhagavān śrāvastīyam viharati | tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo anuvarṣam upasthāpayanti | tāsāṁ dāni kaukṛtyaṁ | kin nu khalv etaṁ labhyaṁ kartuṁ | utāho na labhyaṁ | peyālaṁ | yāvad bhagavān āha | tena hi na kṣamati anu-varṣam upasthāpayituṁ | atha khalu vīciḥ kartavyā |
san-lo-bi-vb-pc106:10: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anu-varṣam upasthāpayet pācattikaṁ |
san-lo-bi-vb-pc106:13: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ti yā puna bhikṣuṇī ti upasampannā |
san-lo-bi-vb-pc106:19: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anu-varṣam upasthāpayeti pācattikaṁ | ekaṁ varṣam upasthāpayitavyaṁ | apara-varṣe vīciḥ kartavyā | atha dāni bhikṣuṇī kṛtapuṇyā bhavati ekaṁ varṣaṁ śikṣā deśayitavyā | aparaṁ varṣam upasthāpayitavyā | kiñcāpi bhikṣuḥ anu-varṣam upasthāpayed an-āpattiḥ | tena bhagavān āha |
san-lo-bi-vb-pc106:21: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anu-varṣam upasthāpayet pācattikam || 6 ||
